offerTitle: The Doral & Co. Jampacked Free Carton Offer

offerDetails.eligibility: Offer restricted to smokers 21 years of age or older.
offerDetails.nonTransferable: Offer is non-transferable; limited to original addressee.
offerDetails.instructions: To receive your carton, please fill out items 1-4 on the order form and mail along with 70 pack seals to the address below.
offerDetails.addressCorrection: If your name or address is not printed correctly, please make corrections below.
offerDetails.signatureRequirement: Your signature and birthdate are required to determine your eligibility.
offerDetails.mailingAddress: The Doral & Co. Free Carton Offer, P.O. Box 5839, Norwood, MN 55583-5839
offerDetails.proofOfPurchase: All Doral pack seals (Proofs-of-Purchase) must have one of these Premium Taste logos.
